document.discussion_title: Luna Innovations Inc. (LUNA) Downgraded by Zacks Investment Research to “Sell”
document.topic_text: Tweet Zacks Investment Research downgraded shares of Luna Innovations Inc. (NASDAQ:LUNA) from a hold rating to a sell rating in a research report released on Tuesday morning. According to Zacks, “LUNA INNOVATIONS INCORPORATED develops and manufactures new-generation products for the healthcare, telecommunications, energy and defense markets. Luna develops technologies in four primary areas: Sensors & Systems; Health Sciences; Materials & Secure Computing. Luna’s product offerings generally fit into two categories: Instrumentation, Test & Measurement & Healthcare. The products are used to measure, monitor, protect and improve critical processes in the markets we serve. Through its disciplined commercialization business model, Luna has become a recognized leader in transitioning science to solutions. Luna is headquartered in Roanoke, Virginia. “ Separately, TheStreet raised shares of Luna Innovations from a sell rating to a hold rating in a research report on Wednesday, August 10th. In related news, Director Richard Roedel bought 39,200 shares of the company’s stock in a transaction that occurred on Wednesday, June 15th. The shares were purchased at an average cost of $1.18 per share, with a total value of $46,256.00. The purchase was disclosed in a document filed with the SEC, which is available through this hyperlink . Luna Innovations ( NASDAQ:LUNA ) opened at 1.12 on Tuesday. Luna Innovations has a 12 month low of $0.74 and a 12 month high of $1.61. The firm has a market cap of $31.02 million and a P/E ratio of 6.44. The firm has a 50 day moving average of $1.29 and a 200-day moving average of $1.10. Luna Innovations (NASDAQ:LUNA) last announced its quarterly earnings data on Tuesday, August 9th. The company reported ($0.03) EPS for the quarter, missing the Zacks’ consensus estimate of ($0.01) by $0.02. On average, equities research analysts forecast that Luna Innovations will post ($0.09) earnings per share for the current year. Luna Innovations Incorporated develops, manufactures and markets fiber optic sensing and test, and measurement products. The Company is focused on bringing technology solutions to measure and monitor processes in the aerospace, automotive, energy, composite, telecommunications and defense industries. Get a free copy of the Zacks research report on Luna Innovations (LUNA) For more information about research offerings from Zacks Investment Research, visit Zacks.com Luna Innovations Inc. Luna Innovations Inc.
